content: I packed it back up in bag it was delivered in, looked used anyway. Several labels as if it was returned before and i got a resale piece.. very disappointed in the first time using your products.  I will not be getting another. It never associated my device... piece of junk... go get The Ring... better product and application works unlike this.

I don't recall ever when someone pressed the bell and the phone rings immediately.. usually happens 15mins later, so missed so many deliveries because of this. The live view doesn't work all the time, it's like the camera loses reception.

Could not view the live video, just gray box. Interface was slow and hard to use. Kept trying to get me to sign up for more services... why on Earth would I pay more if the existing features don't work? Customer service had me reset my internet connection which ended the chat but didn't solve the problem. After that all I got was auto reply to leave my email and they'd get back to me in a few days. Don't call us, we'll call you. Zero stars, would not recommend.
Camera streams for about 10 seconds before the cloud service advertisement takes over the entire screen and makes you back up and reload. Makes it basically useless as a nannycam currently.
This app doesn't open at all uninstalled n reinstalled so many times, cant even use my brand new home security camera!
Its good to have Vue bell
Vuebell was working great when first installed but now there is a delay in getting information when someone is at my door. Usually after the fact.

Doorbell is ok. But why only Alexa support and not Google home? Goggle home is a must. Originally gave it 2 stars. Would change it to 0 stars if possible. I like the doorbell but it hasn't worked right for cake or motion for a long time now. No fix in sight.

Notifications are delayed when my screen is off. Constantly miss callers at the door, and support promise app update then do nothing. I don't mind paying for cloud storage, but what's the point when notifications are so badly affected by delayed delivery.
USELESS. FROM DAY. ONE

Since my husband and I both upgraded our phones to Huawei p20 pro, the notifications on our phones are lagging behind, so our phones ring 5-10 mins after Mr Amazon prime has already delivered our package. Will be considering changing to the Ring doorbell soon if problem keeps persisting as its currently pointless.

The app could be good but there are some problems with it. To view on Alexa it lags behind so someone's through the door before being spotted on camera it's also very sensitive on a night the sencer keeps going off so much so I have to turn it off so I can sleep defeats the object then!! Also I discovered you can only pay for cloud recording in US dollars so here in the UK you pay more in conversion rates and charges!
i have problems with it alot

The app should give the option to the user to set the duration of the call when someone presses the doorbell. Currently the phone is ringing continuously until you answer or reject the call. Also when using the phone to answer the call the it creates an echo due to the mic and loudspeaker noise (this is notable on all smartphones i tested) but not on Tablets. Also it should be possible to connect it on Google Home devices.
It's being v. great. Only can't talk to person at the door through phone.
too sensitive kept going off!...even when a flag flapped near by...
easy to use
i wish it had a sd card for storage.
great bit of kit
Need more features like ring

I have had so many issues with this video doorbell not working well over the 2 years I have had it. I can have packages dropped off at my front door, which is where the Vuebell is located, and no photos are taken of anything. However if it is windy out, it will take many pics of the trees. I now discovered that my device has completely disappeared from the app! I have purchased a different video doorbell, just waiting to have it installed. This device and app are too buggy to recommend.

The application is always blocked at the most inopportune moments ... You can not trust it, it's not safe. I'm not sure either that he'll send a video of who's at the door ... and it's a service I'm paying for. If I had known all this I would not have bought it, in that case I would have gone to a product of the competition as Ring Door. I am very disgusted with the product. Especially with the software. I do not even have a version that works in windows. I've been waiting for several months to see if the software improves but it's still plagued with errors. At every moment it is blocked and disconnected from the Wi-Fi network, and it needs to be reinitialized.

**UPDATE** it has been a year since I installed it. It has been laggy in the last year. Made complained and went back and forward with that support team. I stopped contacting them for a while then in the last couple months I started the issue again. But the support team this time is better. Seems like they have more budget or resources to spend on the app improvement. Apps is 10 times better now. One last complain is only the fact that if I reboot my WAP, it will not work as well with the sound. I had to reboot it by unplugging it from power. Hope you guys can create a function to reboot the device without me unplugging from power.

New updates make this app AMAZING! Motion zones (it'd be nice if the grid were finer), sensitivity, etc. Thanks for all your hard work! Previous review: Latest version, and I can actually answer the call with a bit of hassle. Would be nice if that got simplified/reliable (try to answer, screen stays on, keeps ringing). Would be nice to change ringtone, to have a solid blue button on the device instead of flashing, or an actual button (very few people ring the bell because they don't know how, but I'm not really complaining!), to offer additional doorbell boxes for in the house. Detects motion farther than they say!
Too much delay in audio
Its not working right since the update!!! Fix it!!!!
Again app isn't working terrible piece of junk
Ever since update 9/21/18 live video will not play. Have to uninstall and reinstall EVERYDAY. Known problem with galaxy phones.

I hate this new update, it now has an ad pop up every time I open the app, I guess they forgot to mention that in the what's new part. This is the worst app I've ever used, don't waste your money on this pos buy the ring instead I sure wish I had.
Live feed stop working after last update. Just uninstall and reinstall and it started back working for a couple of hours. Right back messed up. I just use PPBell, it works just fine.
Today's update has broken the live feed just get a blurred image from earlier today.

After today's update 9/21/18 my live feed stopped working. Everything else works still, but the live feed was working before the latest update. 9/23/18 contacted support, they suggested uninstalling, rebooting and reinstalling. That fixed the problem.
Sept 2018 update totally broke live view. App completely non functional. Try PPBell app.... Feed still works with that.
Just updated and now there is no live feed!! What now please?
After updated live feed will not work!! Disappointed!!

Frustrated after trying to add the vuebell out door camera many times. I 
was able to add it once and worked for few days and stopped working. I 
removed and tried adding again, but never worked! Please fix. Money wasted.
Veeeeerrrrryyyyyy sloooooowwww (to the extent it is pretty much unusable).
After update can not use live video.. stopped again and again... -.-
The app crashes won't even open after update
App used to work, after latest update it just crashes.
APP WILL NOT LET ME SEE THE CAMERA. AFTER RECENT UPDATE THAT THEY DID.

The app needs improvement. If your phone is locked when it receives a push 
notification, clicking on the button to answer the call does not connect 
you to the live feed. Therefore you cannot talk to the caller. There is 
also considerable lag when trying to talk to the caller. The hardware is 
good, but the experience could be so much better if the app was improved. 
On Huawei P10 Lite and Samsung S7.

The app is buggy to the extent where android asks to shut it down because it is slowing down the phone. My phone rarely rings if someone is at the door. The quality of the App needs addressing (on Samsung Note 8)
Last update is harmful software, Kaspersky antivirus said !!!!
It works really well now! The app used to be quite buggy and slow. Which was annoying! However well done for the updates as you seem to have sorted all the issues!
No sound on Bluetooth headphones! And the connection is very bad. I can't hear the person at the door, and the person can't hear me!

Very annoying ad each time you open the app, even after paying lots for the bell itself. Push notifications cannot be turned off, which has a bug in the software. All movement is therefore notified. The bell does not automatically reconnect to the internet after power failure, which makes it very unlikely for me to ever purchase any of Vuebells products, nor recommended them.
Installed bell & it doesn't seem to connect to the internet.  It is connected to my wireless but light stays white.  App never finds unit.  Now I see lots of bad reviews for the app.  Junk...
Crashes on my Note 8 ever time it tries to show the camera feed
Current update now no longer works FIX ASAP please otherwise useless. Option NOT to update would help.
The new update doesn't work. Fix it quick otherwise what is the point!
Bell and camera are fine customer service sucks

27/1/18 Latest update provokes a warning from my security software!!! There is a flaw that allows intruders to harm your device or exploit you're personal data!!  I have tried everything to get the VueBell to perform as advertised. Lots of messages to and from support - new WiFi repeater very close to the VueBell unit, new power supply unit, factory reset, changed the settings. The motion detection has never worked despite trying every different configuration; it will catch every bus in the 'OFF' detection zone but miss people coming in and out of the house! I have to accept that VueBell is nothing more than a good idea a good idea and cannot fulfill the promises. Support promised to replace my faulty unit weeks ago but then stopped answering my messages. Looks like Amazon are going to get another return.

Its an ok door bell, works sometimes. Majority of the time it doesn't. Got it as a Christmas present, going to change it soon. Get a decent one like ring or the new nest door bell when it is released.

The door bell worked fine for 2 2 weeks then it just stopped ? It still rings but no camera and no connection to my phone or Wi-Fi. Even a reconnect to Wi-Fi and still nothing?  What's wrong with it??
Don't like it too intrusive. Bad deal do not buy
Crashes every time I open it from my note 8. Also when it was working the mic and speaker didn't work. Couldn't really talk to anyone. Fix these and I'll fix my rating
Works great on my smartphone but wish it worked on the firestick

Very easy to install total installation, about 30 minutes. It will work with your old copper coil doorbell but not newer doorbells. I like the plugin doorbell it came with much better; it has about 20 different tunes including happy birthday to you! Its fantastic for birthday parties. It is very quick (seconds) to alert me to visitors breaking the motion beam or when the doorbell is pushed. Pictures for motion, video for when doorbell is pressed. Love the live view very much! Sometimes the voices on both sides of the conversation lags but not all the time.True the blue doorbell light is hard to see during daylight but is does come with 2 plastic stickers that says Push Here. It has a very large field of view. The clarity is pretty good except for peoples faces for some reason. The motion area / sensitivity can be expanded to fit your needs. I've had  zero false alerts in about 20 days. My porch is high so I only get alerted to people about 1/2 up 7 stairs. If I could point it down some I guess it would do better. Its a fairly large doorbell, I could only screw in the left side due to my sidelights being narrow. So I made a wood mount its very sturdy regardless.
Buggy

Works well for us, linked in easily to several phones, activates before the bell is rung and when the bell is pressed, no lag for us even when picking up a movement from work. Voice is clear and so is the footage. Not used the cloud function yet. Phones are android, in house wifi averages about 20+mbps.

Can't recommend this at all.  It doesn't transmit voice from the phone to the doorbell, it doesn't always send the motion detection alerts and the volume of the sound coming in from the doorbell to the app is so low that it is almost unintelligible...  and then there's the lag.    The live chat has never worked for me and the supposed free call help desk is in the US.  If you've bought the bell already then good luck with making it work. If you haven't, then carefully consider whether you want to.  The doorbell itself isn't even heavy enough to make it a useful paperweight
Installed ok and seems to work including ringing my phone if someone rings the bell. App seems basic but functional.

I just installed the camera and everytime the doorbell was pressed there was no easy way to answer the call on the phone. There was a big lag. Possibly need to allow background power changes to ensure app does not go to sleep. I have uninstalled and am using ppbell app it works much better.

Not too difficult to install and set up. BUT it only works for a few seconds every day. It's very slow to update and the chime doesn't always work. I hate it. It's worse than useless. Intercom feature has never worked and by the time I can see anyone on the camera, they are well gone.
Latest update had fixed all my previous issues! 😀
Worked fine until latest update. Now does not inform phone that there's someone at your door. What's the point. It's going back if not sorted

App no longer opens when somebody Rings your doorbell.  What's the purpose of video doorbell if it doesn't alert you. --- I'll change my review IF they fix it. -- Until  than that stay clear, don't spend money on their cloud service, and buy something else

Android alerts don't work, Apple alerts do. this company has multiple apps that work with it's tech, search ppbell for those Android users looking for an older version of app which works perfectly with push notifications. Tech support are standard first line, I doubt you will speak to an engineer ever! the product itself is good and built well for plastic! Motion sensor is a little hit and miss! let's see what they fix otherwise I may acquire a refund

Phone no longer tells you when there's someone at the door. Defeats the purpose Surely?? I've messaged you lots of times through your help section and no one has got back to me? It worked before the new Update. Update: 11/06/17 I'm now getting no motion detections or ringing whatsoever even if I stand outside shaking my hands in front of the camera. New update needs fixed asap as I'm unable to get to the door and I rely on this to work. Sort it out developers. Seems they get u to but the camera and after that they don't want to know. UPDATE: they updated the app this morning 15/06/17 And the doorbell still doesn't ring or tell you when anyone's there!! I'm sending this back to amazon and going to complain 're a refund for paying a fitter as well completely useless considering I've just had an operation!! Don't buy if you want a bell that doesn't ring.
It doesn't work, I couldn't set it up, I spent hours on the phone with my internet provider and Vue bell, the Vue bell guy said he would call me back but never did. Don't waste your time
Update means phone no longer rings when the doorbell rings.
New app version works well here. Had to update the notification times though to start getting notifications. Overall pleased.
after update nothing works.  cant add a device because it says it already exists and can't see anything else to do. used to be 4 stars, now useless.

A great product and app thats constantly being updated and improved.  You can open a chat within the app and talk with very responsive staff who clearly care about the product and their customers.   They actualy listen and implement sugested changes and improvements 5 stars for the product the app ans most of all brilliant customer service!

After update , when doorbell  rings, app only shows small notification like incoming email and there is no simple way to answer the ring. Previous version used show screen that looked like incoming phone call and was easy to answer with one click on green button.
Great app, not perfect but does the job done.

The interface update went well. I like the new interface but I don't like that you can't swipe to see pics like before, you have to click on each pic. Then last night the new interface had an update, it has turned my viewing to black and white only. VUE BELL PLEASE SEND OUT A NEW UPDATE! Otherwise I'm happy with this product and wish that they would come out with battery operated wireless cameras.
New app update and this product no longer works! Buy the ring not vuebell!

I really am happy with my Vuebell doorbell purchase! It notifies me when it senses motion... Further than it needs to but that's okay because it doesn't hardly use any phone battery. I love the ability to answer the bell with the phone! Never had a crash... Only issue I really have is the backlighting at times so the image looks more like a shadow so I can not always make out who is at the door but then I just speak through my phone and ask our have them step back some.
App says I have an invalid emaill address when trying to sign up
Crashes. Won't stay connected. Laggy video.
Crashes all the time. Takes a long time to answer door and see video.  Also makes my door bell hum
Great security for me giving me piece of mind when I'm out.  I get constant notifications and shows all activity.
Constant crash on Nexus 6p, unreliable notifications when not crashing.
great APP
needs to improve the user interface can take the example of idoorbell
